thread.title: Adil Rashid makes England Test debut against Pakistan
thread.title_full: Adil Rashid makes England Test debut against Pakistan

title: Adil Rashid makes England Test debut against Pakistan
text:
Adil Rashid makes England Test debut against Pakistan 13 Oct 2015 05:46:59 
comments 
Adil Rashid was named for his Test debut as England began their three-match series against Pakistan. 
Rashid will figure as a second spinner at the Zyed Cricket Stadium alongside his fellow all-rounder Moeen Ali, who will open the batting with Alastair Cook. 
For Pakistan, key leg-spinner Yasir Shah failed to recover from his back spasm - and the hosts therefore brought in Imran Khan as a third seamer. 
Pakistan won the toss and chose to bat first on a pitch expected to give the seamers a little early help and then increasingly favour spin. Related Sport News
